parameters.subject: AI-Generated Blog Post Ready for Review: {{ $json.title }}

credentials.htmlBody:
={{ $file.readFileAsString('c:\Users\Micha\OneDrive\Documents\my-marketplace-project\email-templates\blog-approval.html')
  .replace('{{approverName}}', $('Google Sheets Trigger').item.json['Approver Name'] || 'there')
  .replace('{{blogTitle}}', $json.title)
  .replace('{{metaDescription}}', $json.metaDescription)
  .replace('{{blogSlug}}', $json.slug)
  .replace('{{contentPreview}}', $json.content.substring(0, 500))
  .replace('{{approveUrl}}', `https://azani.co.uk/api/blog/approve-ai-content?id=${$('Google Sheets Trigger').item.json.id}&action=approve&token=${$env.APPROVAL_TOKEN}`)
  .replace('{{editUrl}}', `https://azani.co.uk/admin/blog/edit-ai-content?id=${$('Google Sheets Trigger').item.json.id}`)
  .replace('{{rejectUrl}}', `https://azani.co.uk/api/blog/approve-ai-content?id=${$('Google Sheets Trigger').item.json.id}&action=reject&token=${$env.APPROVAL_TOKEN}`)
  .replace('{{currentYear}}', new Date().getFullYear()) }}

parametersUi.responseBody:
Content Rejected

The AI-generated blog post has been rejected.

Return to Blog Admin

Content Approved

The AI-generated blog post has been approved and published.

View Published Post

documentId.__rl:

parameters.contentValue:
AI-Generated Blog Post Ready for Review

An AI-generated blog post is ready for your review before publishing.

Title: {{ $json.title }}

Meta Description: {{ $json.metaDescription }}

Content Preview:

{{ $json.content.substring(0, 300) }}...

Approve & Publish Reject

You can also view and edit the full content in the Google Sheet before making a decision.

{{ new Date().getFullYear() }} Arzani. All rights reserved.

If you have any questions, please contact our support team.
